Description:
Model
Brand: MSI
Series: SPATIUM M560
Model: SM560N1TB
Device Type: Internal Solid State Drive (SSD)
Used For: Consumer


Details
Form Factor: M.2 2280
Capacity: 1TB
Memory Components: 3D NAND
Interface: PCI-Express 5.0 x4
Protocol: NVMe 2.0
Controller: PHISON E31T


Performance
Max Sequential Read: Up to 10200 MBps
Max Sequential Write: Up to 8400 MBps
4KB Random Read: Up to 1,300,000 IOPS
4KB Random Write: Up to 1,400,000 IOPS
Terabytes Written (TBW): 600TB
MTBF: 1,500,000 hours


Features
Features: TRIM (Performance Optimization, OS support required)
SMART (Self-Monitoring, Analysis and Reporting Technology)
LDPC (Low Density Parity Check) ECC Algorithm
End to End Data Path Protection
APST (Autonomous Power State Transition)


Environmental
Power Consumption (Idle): 50 mW
Power Consumption (Active): 5.9W
Operating Temperature: 0°C ~ +70°C


Dimensions & Weight

Width: 80mm
Depth: 2.15mm
